channel.title: MooseScape Client and Server Progress [Delta Based 317]
channel.description:
I'm using delta's client and server as a base here's what I've gotten so far...
[b]1. Real Equipment Screen With Proper Bonuses, Character Rotating, Etc.... (woot!)[/b] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/1057/realequipmentscreenwith.jpg[/img]
[b]2. D Claws Spec[/b] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/7268/dclawsspec1.jpg[/img]
[b]3. Barrows In Correct Places With Tunnels. Aggresive only to whoever summoned them... Also Dharok hits higher at lower health, guthan randomly heals, and verac hits through prayer and armor[/b] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/5368/barrowsincorrectplaces1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img158.imageshack.us/img158/3166/alreadykilledguthan.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img158.imageshack.us/img158/9135/dharokhitting51.jpg[/img]
Updates
[code]March 8, 2009: Removed 75% of NPC noclipping thanks to some tutorials (yay!)[/code]
I'll add more with time, thanks for the look =]

item.title: MooseScape Client and Server Progress [Delta Based 317]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Djayboi6, post:8, topic:266503”][quote author=faded vision link=topic=351965.msg2700461#msg2700461 date=1236558159]
ew new hp bar pl0x[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 06:23:06 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Teh Moose link=topic=351965.msg2700423#msg2700423 date=1236556400]

1. Real Equipment Screen With Proper Bonuses, Character Rotating, Etc… (woot!)

[/quote]

thats cool
[/quote]
meh,the project me and my friend are working has that and heres proof:
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,350487.0.html[/quote]
I think Kubanito quit, since I was testing his server, and Emulous crashes when you die.

Read full topic

item.title: MooseScape Client and Server Progress [Delta Based 317]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I’m using delta’s client and server as a base here’s what I’ve gotten so far…

1. Real Equipment Screen With Proper Bonuses, Character Rotating, Etc… (woot!)

2. D Claws Spec

3. Barrows In Correct Places With Tunnels. Aggresive only to whoever summoned them… Also Dharok hits higher at lower health, guthan randomly heals, and verac hits through prayer and armor

Updates

March 8, 2009: Removed 75% of NPC noclipping thanks to some tutorials (yay!)

I’ll add more with time, thanks for the look =]

Read full topic
